title: enrich_ingredients can panic on serde round-trip
description: server/src/api/enrich.rs:25-28 does serde_json::to_value(&ing).unwrap() then serde_json::from_value(...).unwrap() to convert between Ingredient and ParsedIngredient. If the types diverge (field added to one but not the other), this panics in a user-facing API handler. Should propagate the error and return a 500.
